i18n.components.header_website.support_a: Navigate to documentation on how to support activist
i18n.components.landing_splash.message_1: A platform for growing our movements and organizing actions.
i18n.components.landing_splash.message_2: Free, open-source, privacy-focused and governed by our community.
i18n.components.landing_tech_banner.open: We're dedicated to working in the open to build trust with our partner organizations and fellow activists. All who want to help us build are welcome!
Expand or collapse the right sidebar
i18n.pages.index.activist_section_btn_ar: Learn more about activist.org and how it functions
i18n.pages.index.activist_section_text: We're a global team of contributors with a shared goal: Let's update how people can get politically active and organized.
i18n.pages.index.get_active_aria_label: Learn more about getting involved in an activist organization
i18n.pages.index.get_active_text: Discover, participate in and collaborate on events that work towards change. Support in the best way you can: collect signatures, host panel discussions, unionize at your workplace, organize direct action and much more.
i18n.pages.index.get_organized_aria_labe: Learn more about organizing an activist organization
i18n.pages.index.get_organized_img_alt_t: Drawing of fists in a circle pointed at the center.
i18n.pages.index.get_organized_text: Connect with people across organizations and movements. Build solidarity with co-workers, neighbors, refugees and others. Understand who supports who and organize powerful coalitions.
i18n.pages.index.grow_organization_aria_: Learn more about growing an activist organization
i18n.pages.index.grow_organization_img_a: Drawing of fists raised upwards in a group.
i18n.pages.index.grow_organization_text: Take new people effectively from interest to action. Gain and maintain momentum for your movement. Get the help you need from a global community. Seamlessly integrate our platform with your existing tools.
i18n.pages.index.our_supporters_sub_text: Sponsorship does not equal influence. activist will always only be governed by its community.
i18n.pages.index.our_supporters_text: Help us create and maintain our open-source activism platform. Please consider contributing your skills, reach or money.
i18n.pages.index.title: Welcome
i18n._global.activist_icon_img_alt_text: The activist icon: a lower case letter a with a half circle pointing down and to the left in the center.
